ὑπερυψόω,
exalt exceedingly, τινα [NT]:—passive, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to exalt to the highest place
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to exalt to the highest place
to exalt supremely, exalt to the highest place Phil. 2:9*
